lead_paragraph: Cheng Le, 22, was arrested in December 2014 after he tried to buy lethal doses of the toxin from an undercover F.B.I. employee on the Internet.

headline.print_headline: Man Receives  16-Year Term  for Trying  to Get Ricin
headline.main: Man Who Tried to Obtain Ricin Is Sentenced to 16 Years

snippet: Cheng Le, 22, was arrested in December 2014 after he tried to buy lethal doses of the toxin from an undercover F.B.I. employee on the Internet.
abstract: Manhattan judge sentences Cheng Le to 16 years in prison for trying to obtain ricin poison in 2014 for sale as weapon.
